decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:  P001, P002, P003, P004, P005, P006 AND P007 received on 13/12/2011.  REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2011). | Prior to the commencement of the development, a tree survey and method statement setting out the measures to ensure full protection of the tree on site to BS 5837 2005, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall thereafter be carried out only in accordance with the approved method statement, which shall apply until the end of the construction period, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.   Reason: To prevent damage to the tree within close proximity to the development in the interests of the visual character and appearance of the area in accordance policies 4.1 and 4.5 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' 2004 and adopted SPG 9: 'Trees and Development Guidelines'.
description: Ground floor rear extension to number 46 Hathaway Gardens and first floor rear extension to number 48 Hathaway Gardens, following demolition of existing conservatory
